mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gall_dog (board_num, board_title, board_content, writer, replycount) VALUES (board_num.nextval, #{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{writer}, #{replycount})
mapper.update: UPDATE gall_dog SET board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content}, m_date=SYSDATE WHERE board_num=#{board_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM gall_dog ORDER BY board_num DESC
